channel.title: Weapon Damage Help
channel.description: Is there anyway that i can change a certain weapon's damage up? So it is one hit kill. This weapon will be used for owner only because sometimes i walk in wild after i add something and someone comes up and attacks me, so i need a 1 hit kill weapon. Any help would me much appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: Weapon Damage Help
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

yeah bro if you wanna hop on my server to take a peek and see if you like anything?

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Damage Help
item.dc:creator: @Anemosity Anemosity
item.description:
@Anemosity wrote:

[quote=“kingofnone, post:11, topic:229114”]yeah man this is easy=]
k what you do is go to the first item.cfg file and search (say we are doing whip)

item = 4151 k now after that you see A_WEAPON_FROM_THE_ABYSS and some numbers first 3 numbers are your prices and then there are like 10 more the second one after your prices is the str bonus.

A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	4000000	4000000	4000000	0	102	0	0

k now just change the 102 to like 999999999 or something and save and compile[/quote]umm didn’t work only game me errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Damage Help
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

yeah man this is easy=]
k what you do is go to the first item.cfg file and search (say we are doing whip)

item = 4151 k now after that you see A_WEAPON_FROM_THE_ABYSS and some numbers first 3 numbers are your prices and then there are like 10 more the second one after your prices is the str bonus.

A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	4000000	4000000	4000000	0	102	0	0

k now just change the 102 to like 999999999 or something and save and compile
(note the little square thingys are filling in for spaces for some reason but it wont matter

Read full topic
